author: sebor
msg: (_C_grow): Removed an unnecessary function argument, used the
* sstream.cc (str): Extended to allow to be called with own
buffer as an argument to grow it.
(xsputn): Defined for better efficiency than the base class
(setbuf): Set the "high mark" in out mode.

author: sebor
msg: * _defs.h (_M_IA64): Used instead of the generic MSVC _WIN64 macro
to distinguish between the IA64 SDK and ordinary WIN64 environments

author: jmarino
msg: rename setReferenceBuilder to setPolicyBuilder on JavaComponentContextBuilder as it is more descriptive; add Javadoc on mock Foo binding
